resources.string: Data has been changed.\nDo you want to save changes?
Not all required permissions have been granted
For a proper work, the program requires your permission to access Internal Storage.\nWithout this permission, the program will not be able to work!

This program inserts a text received via the Share button to one of the user-specified files in the DOWNLOAD FOLDER.

Just list file names in the input field below, and an entry will be added to one of them (without .txt , the program will add the extension itself); then send any selected text to the program via the Share button (Send in some programs), and it will be saved in the file you specified.

If the file name is not specified, the default entries will be saved in the _MWshare2save.txt file.

The underscore at the beginning of the file names is added specifically so that the files could be at the top of the list in the download folder.
Each file name should start on a new line
If checked, the entry will be added to the beginning of the file, otherwise to the end
